com.rigado.rigablue

Class RigCoreBluetooth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rigado.rigablue.RigCoreBluetooth
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRigCoreListener

    public class RigCoreBluetooth
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRigCoreListener
    This class manages interactions with the BluetoothGatt objects representing device connections.
